product_name: NiteRider Pro 2200 Enduro Front Bike Light
long_description: A lightweight wonder for serious riders who train after the sun goes down, the Pro 2200 Enduro boasts exceptional performance and beam pattern that offers an incredibly bright 2,200 lumens.
short_description: A lightweight wonder for serious riders who train after the sun goes down, the Pro 2200 Enduro boasts exceptional performance and beam pattern that offers an incredibly bright 2,200 lumens.
